statements: SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value;
SELECT vehicle_brand, vehicle_model, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value ORDER BY manufacturing_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_brand, manufacturing_year, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value WHERE manufacturing_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value WHERE vehicle_brand = 'Tesla';
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value ORDER BY resale_value DESC;
SELECT vehicle_brand, vehicle_model, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value WHERE manufacturing_year >= 2018;
SELECT vehicle_brand, manufacturing_year, SUM(resale_value) AS total_resale_value FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value GROUP BY vehicle_brand, manufacturing_year;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value WHERE resale_value BETWEEN 20000 AND 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_brand FROM electric_vehicles_resale_value ORDER BY vehicle_brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2017;
SELECT ev_id, model, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY resale_value DESC;
SELECT owner_name, ownership_start_date FROM owners WHERE ownership_start_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, model FROM owners JOIN electric_vehicles ON owners.ev_id = electric_vehicles.ev_id;
SELECT model, year FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT owner_name, model, year FROM owners o JOIN electric_vehicles ev ON o.ev_id = ev.ev_id WHERE ownership_start_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT model, year, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year >= 2018 AND resale_value > 20000 ORDER BY model ASC
SELECT owner_name, model, year FROM owners o JOIN electric_vehicles ev ON o.ev_id = ev.ev_id WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT model, year, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY resale_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2018;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM vehicle_sales WHERE sale_price > 50000;
SELECT brand, model, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY resale_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY brand ASC, year DESC;
SELECT brand, model, resale_value FROM electric_vehicles WHERE resale_value > 25000;
SELECT EV.brand, EV.model, VS.sale_price FROM electric_vehicles EV JOIN vehicle_sales VS ON EV.vehicle_id = VS.vehicle_id WHERE VS.sale_price > 30000;
SELECT brand, year, SUM(resale_value) AS total_resale_value FROM electric_vehicles GROUP BY brand, year;

SELECT O.owner_name, O.email, EV.brand, VS.sale_date FROM owners O JOIN vehicle_sales VS ON O.owner_id = VS.owner_id JOIN electric_vehicles EV ON VS.vehicle_id = EV.vehicle_id WHERE VS.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue;
SELECT model_name, year, resale_value FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM Manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM VehicleModel WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue;
SELECT model_name, year, resale_value FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, AVG(resale_value) AS average_resale_value FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT v.model_name, m.manufacturer_name, v.production_year FROM VehicleModel v JOIN Manufacturer m ON v.manufacturer_id = m.manufacturer_id;
SELECT r.reseller_name, r.address, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS number_of_vehicles FROM ElectricVehicleResaleValue e JOIN Reseller r ON e.vehicle_id = r.reseller_id GROUP BY r.reseller_name, r.address;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM ElectricVehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters FROM EVManufacturers WHERE founding_year > 2000;
SELECT user_name, age, location FROM EVUsers WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_description FROM EVServiceRecords ORDER BY service_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY resale_value DESC;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM ElectricVehicles WHERE brand = 'Tesla' ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters FROM EVManufacturers WHERE founding_year < 2000;
SELECT user_name, age, location FROM EVUsers WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM EVServiceRecords WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
